attributes.action: The government to honour the £350m a week promised in Referendum to the NHS.
attributes.additional_details: It was part of the 'Leave' campaign and many people voted for it, because this undertaking was made.
attributes.background: We would like to see the government do what is right and pay what was promised by the current Prime Minister in the Leave campaign. The promise comprised of, saving £350 million a week paid to the EU and to be spent on the NHS instead (on top of the current budget).

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327376

You may be interested to know that the Government has introduced a new law that will increase funding for the NHS by £33.9 billion a year (in cash terms) by 2023/24. You can find out more here: https://services.parliament.uk/Bills/2019-21/nhsfunding.html
